title: Ticks client wrapper
description:
Wrap tk CLI commands in Go.

internal/ticks/client.go:
- NextTask(epicID string) (*Task, error) - calls tk next
- GetEpic(epicID string) (*Epic, error) - calls tk show  
- CloseTask(taskID, reason string) error - calls tk close
- AddNote(epicID, message string) error - calls tk note
- GetNotes(epicID string) ([]string, error) - parses tk show

Parse JSON output from tk commands (--json flag).

Verify: Can fetch next task from an epic, close it, add notes.
